section.note: In the samples below, :SRID indicates the optional spatial reference identifier argument. For PostgreSQL, the default is 4326.

case.description: The database must be created with the template "template_postgis".
case.example: CREATE DATABASE myDB WITH OWNER myowner TEMPLATE = template_postgis;

section.title: Creating and Dropping Tables with Geometry Columns

case.title: Creating
case.example:
CREATE TABLE "GeogTest" ( "KeyValue" varchar(25) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("KeyValue"))
SELECT AddGeometryColumn('GeogTest', 'Location', 4326, 'GEOMETRY', 2);

case.title: Portable
case.example: INSERT INTO GeogTest (KeyValue, Location) values('Item1', GeogCreateLocation(-70, 42, :SRID))

case.title: Native
case.example: INSERT INTO "GeogTest" ("KeyValue", "Location") VALUES ('Item1', ST_GeometryFromText('POINT(' || CAST( - 70 as VARCHAR(1024)) || ' ' || CAST(42 as VARCHAR(1024)) || ')', CAST(:SRID AS INT)))

case.title: Portable
case.example: INSERT INTO GeogTest (KeyValue, Location) values('Item2', GeogCreateLine(-70, 42, -70, 38, :SRID))

case.title: Native
case.example: INSERT INTO "GeogTest" ("KeyValue", "Location") VALUES ('Item2', ST_GeometryFromText('LINESTRING(' || CAST( - 70 as VARCHAR(1024)) || ' ' || CAST(42 as VARCHAR(1024)) || ', ' || CAST( - 70 as VARCHAR(1024)) || ' ' || CAST(38 as VARCHAR(1024)) || ')', CAST(:SRID AS INT)))

case.title: Portable
case.example: INSERT INTO GeogTest (KeyValue, Location) values('Item3', GeogCreatePolygon(-70, 42, -70, 32, -60, 32, -60, 42, -70, 42, :SRID))

case.title: Native
case.example: INSERT INTO "GeogTest" ("KeyValue", "Location") VALUES ('Item3', ST_GeometryFromText('POLYGON((' || CAST( - 70 as VARCHAR(1024)) || ' ' || CAST(42 as VARCHAR(1024))|| ', ' || CAST( - 70 as VARCHAR(1024)) || ' ' || CAST(32 as VARCHAR(1024))|| ', ' || CAST( - 60 as VARCHAR(1024)) || ' ' || CAST(32 as VARCHAR(1024))|| ', ' || CAST( - 60 as VARCHAR(1024)) || ' ' || CAST(42 as VARCHAR(1024))|| ', ' || CAST( - 70 as VARCHAR(1024)) || ' ' || CAST(42 as VARCHAR(1024))|| '))', CAST(:SRID AS INT)))
